name: Baby Shooter
description:
(THIS IS A SHITPOST GAME! DON'T TAKE IT SERIOUSLY!)

It's 2088, giant baby heads have invaded earth via the Tokyo portal. Almost a third of the earth's population has been decimated by these creatures, which is why you were called to stop them!

CONTROLS!!!!!!!!!!

Left/Right arrow keys: Move

Space: Jump

S: Shoot

Green Flag: Restart after you die.

(This game might get updates idfk)
